session.title: Federated Learning
session.gist: Federated Learning with Google's tensorflow - tff framework. TensorFlow Federated (TFF) is an open-source framework for machine learning and other computations on decentralized data. TFF has been developed to facilitate open research and experimentation with Federated Learning (FL), an approach to machine learning where a shared global model is trained across many participating clients that keep their training data locally.

session.title: Federated Learning
session.gist: Federated Learning with Google's tensorflow - tff framework. TensorFlow Federated (TFF) is an open-source framework for machine learning and other computations on decentralized data. TFF has been developed to facilitate open research and experimentation with Federated Learning (FL), an approach to machine learning where a shared global model is trained across many participating clients that keep their training data locally.

session.title: Deep Convolutional Neural Networks and Future
session.organizer: Bay Area Women in Machine Learning & Data Science
session.gist: Convolutional Neural Networks, works on paradigm of sharing of weights in AI thereby creating kernels that filter information from the data. This simple idea along with open-source frameworks lead to many astounding work in DL community, along with implications in many business products that we use daily. We will understand CNNs as the basic level and try to brainstorm what holds for this architectural model in the future given new models and methods to train neural networks.

session.title: Deep Convolutional Neural Networks
session.organizer: Goal Street, International Workshop on Deep Learning
session.gist: Convolutional Neural Networks are almost everywhere where AI decision making is done. Understanding them is the main thing to build a successful neural network which could be used in production. Here I presented the basic building blocks of the CNN models, and how and where they fail.

session.title: Career in AI
session.organizer: Aga Khan Education Board for India
session.gist: As a mentor for the AI/ML/DS Track in the Cycle 4 for the Reach For the Stars programme by AKEBI, I was invited to take a very introductory webinar on careers in AI. The webinar mainly focused on how the early college students start with AI, and what AI actually is. Different roles wherein AI is used, and what tools and technology they need to learn to succeed.

session.title: Capsule Program organized @ PDPU by SilverTouch Techlabs Ltd.
session.organizer: SilverTouch TechLabs Ltd. @ Pandit Deendayal Petroleum University
session.gist: I was invited to take a lecture on Computer Vision and OpenCV by SilverTouch TechLabs Ltd. at Pandit Deendayal Petroleum University as part of the Capsule Programme for 3rd Semester students. The day 3 was on Computer Vision and OpenCV, I taught students what is Computer Vision, its current latest research trends, and where Computer Vision applications are used. Also, hands-on coding session was conducted to create a real-time face detection using the webcam.

code.code_title: OpenCV Scripts Examples with Real Time Face Detection (Modularized Code)

session.title: Machine Learning For InfoSec
session.gist: An introductory lecture on Machine Learning and visualizing what neural networks learn for the people of the cyber security domain.

session.title: Latest Trends and Innovation: Industry 4.0
session.gist: With the resurgence of AI technologies and great research work done by the companies and academicians, what could we as a developer do to withstand the AI wave? The Industry 4.0 is all about Cloud, ML, IOT, which leads to use cases such as smart factories and smart cities. How do we withstand this change? The main skills to learn currently are the cloud (any provider - Google, AWS, Azure), and integrate your ML models with them, if you know these two things, you are good to earn a bread in a city. But understanding ML is a pain, and not just as simple as training a neural network shown on tensorflow website, or importing any ML library. We'll discuss the career path needed to start with AI, and understand what AI is correctly.

session.title: Machine Learning For Imbalanced Class Distributions
session.gist: We could easily overfit machine learning with the data we have, but the quest to reduce the generalization errors, have pushed the Machine Learning researchers to implement new algorithms, and one of the criterion in Supervised Machine Learning, the balance of data distributions is important, but most of the real life datasets are imbalanced, and this gives the zeal to study new algorithms to drive business and research forward. There are various methods at data level and at algorithm level that solves this problem, we will discuss both of them and try to implement both the methods, in this hands-on session.
